# Anexo V {.unnumbered}

$$C = \text{PMT}\cdot \text{FVP}(i,T)$$ {#eq-FVP}

```{r}
FVP <- function(i, t) {
  ((1+i)^t-1)/(i*(1+i)^t)
}
```

```{r}
periods <- c(1:60, 90, 100, 120, 180, 240, 300, 360)
j <- c((1+2/100)^(1/12)-1, (1+3/100)^(1/12)-1, (1+4/100)^(1/12)-1, 
       (1+5/100)^(1/12)-1, 0.5/100, (1+8/100)^(1/12)-1, (1+9/100)^(1/12)-1,
       (1+10/100)^(1/12)-1, (1+11/100)^(1/12)-1, (1+12/100)^(1/12)-1)
```


```{r}
#| label: tbl-FVP
#| tbl-cap: "Fator de Valor Presente (FVP)"
n <- length(periods)
m <- length(j)
M <- matrix(nrow = n, ncol = m)
for (t in 1:n) {
  for (i in 1:m){
    M[t,i] <- FVP(j[i], periods[t])
  }
}
fvp <- as.data.frame(M)
fvp <- cbind(periods, fvp)
colnames(fvp) <- c("T/i(%)", ".165%", ".247%", ".327%", ".407%", ".50%", ".64%", ".72%", 
                   ".80%", ".87%", ".95%")
# rownames(fvp) <- periods
fvp |>
  kable(digits = 3, row.names = F,
        format.args = list(decimal.mark = ",", big.mark = "."))
```

```{r}
#| label: tbl-FVP2
#| tbl-cap: "Fator de Valor Presente (FVP)"
M <- matrix(nrow = n, ncol = 10)
```
